name: boardroom-booking-app
description: A complete boardroom booking application with backend and frontend

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test:services: npm run test --workspace=shared-packages/email-service && npm run test --workspace=shared-packages/auth-service && npm run test --workspace=shared-packages/notification-service
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
